settings.title: Let's Team Up
settings.text: Make your next product healthier and more hydrating than a sports drink without changing its taste.

Hydration isn’t created equally. From high sugar counts and alternative sweeteners to offset electrolytes’ naturally bitter taste to processed and nutritionally sparse salt sources, we saw a lot of room for improvement.

Buoy’s hydration and wellness blends are rich with bioavailable electrolytes, 87 ionic trace minerals, vitamins and antioxidants soluble in any liquid and won’t compromise taste. We did the hard part so you can just add Buoy.

settings.title: More Hydration than a Sports Drink
settings.text: With just 3 servings of any Buoy wellness blend, your drink will have more electrolytes than a Gatorade.

settings.title: Obsessed With Ingredient Quality
settings.text: We tackled aggressive sales teams, misleading ingredient suppliers and global borders to source the best. Our all-natural, hand-harvested sea salt has 87 micronutrients and trace minerals not found in other salt sources.

settings.title: Market with Health and Wellness
settings.text: Co-branding with Buoy is a simple work-around to highlight your new deeply-hydrating beverage while also staying compliant with the strict regulations on packaging

settings.title: Effective Hangover Fighter
settings.text: If your product uses alcohol, adding Buoy is a no-brainer. Give your body exactly what it needs—when it needs it—to efficiently break down and metabolize alcohol and its byproducts.

settings.title: Product Development Experts
settings.text: Our in-house team are experts at bringing your vision to life: from when and how to add hydration into the production process, navigating federal regulations like the TBB, advice on how to structure your label and brainstorming on how to help market.

settings.title: Nova Easy Kombucha
settings.text: They’ve done their homework and that means everything to a brand like Nova, where we strive for transparency and natural ingredients.”

settings.title: WellBeing Brewing Co
settings.text: "Our mission was to create the world’s most hydrating beer but the biggest hurdle was the salty and bitter taste that naturally comes from electrolytes and would ruin the flavor of our drink. It was awesome to find a company that was devoted to overcoming this hurdle and making the production process easy on us."

settings.title: MKombucha
settings.text: "Everything seemed to align: product quality, the Buoy team, their mission and approach to sourcing high bioavailable and fast-absorbing ingredients. They also surprised us with a fantastic lifestyle photoshoot of the finished product.”

settings.head-title: Take our partners’ words for it
settings.sub-text: Our favorite collaborations with innovative brands in their space. Currently, we’re helping a handful of select breweries and distilleries add hydration and wellness in with their brand’s fun.

settings.text: Cold brews, kombucha, matcha, tea, seltzers, beer, cocktails, wine–even soup!

settings.title: You name it, we can hydrate it
